Name: Create: Bells and Whistles
Description: Adds various new decorative blocks to Create, including train Pilots, a new casing type, and metal grab bar and step blocks.

Name: Create: Interiors
Description: Adds furniture blocks (such as new chair blocks) that work with Create contraptions and fit Create's art and modeling styles.

Name: Create: Let The Adventure Begin
Description: Create: Let The Adventure Begin adds Structures 62 unique structures, New Loot, a chance to fish create mod items and much more !!!

Name: Create: Dynamic Village
Description: Adds a host of villager professions & village structures to Create, with trades, loot and contraptions from Create.

Name: Create Unlimited
Description: This mod removes several restrictions in base create mod (basically a remake of tizu69's old Create NTL but slightly better), like placing funny/cursed train tracks, connecting any blocks with glue, putting (almost) anything into copycat blocks, infinite reach with extendo grips and no limits on train curves.

Name: Create: Creating Space
Description: create: creating space is the first create addon that added contraption spaceships. it also has an advanced rocket engine crafting feature along with auto rockets and 4 dimensions

Name: Create: Northstar
Description: Adds an advanced rocket system, astronomy system, and 4 new planets. Inspired by Galacticraft by MicDoodle.

Name: Create Big Cannons
Description: Adds cannons that work with Create

Name: Create: Steam Powered
Description: Adds Steam Engines To Create

Name: Create Enchantment Industry
Description: Tools and methods to handle experience & enchantment in Create like enchanter, disenchanter, book copier and liquid XP.

Name: Create Enchantment Industry Fabric
Description: Create Enchantment Industry for Fabric

Name: Create Chromatic Return
Description: Re-adds Chromatic Compound in a completely different way which incentivises factories and large farms.

Name: Create: New Age
Description: addon for the Create mod that adds integration with electricity.

Name: Create: Diesel Generators
Description: A mod that adds Diesel Generators to the create mod.

Name: Create: Structures
Description: Add-on for Create that implements naturally generating structures containing early-game Create contraptions and items.

Name: Create: Design n' Decor
Description: Aesthetic mod with variants of normal blocks, such as many new boilers, crushing wheels, vaults, and extra blocks the Create: Design 'n' Decor devs thought fit in well with create!

Name: Destroy
Description: Add new chemicals and chemical processes geared around the production of Plastic. Build complex chemical plants, manufacture powerful new explosives, or even break bad, but be careful that along the way you are mitigating your effects on the environment â€“ and yourself! Destroy's flagship feature is its sandbox chemistry system with chemistry simulated at the molecular level. Destroy adds a wealth of features that expand upon Create's existing systems - new kinetic components (e.g. differential or planetary gears), processing machines, and lots of 'curiosities' with novel abilities.

Name: Petrol's Parts
Description: Kinetic blocks added by Destroy mod, but now as a standalone mod. It adds coaxial and large cogwheel, a differential, double Cardan shaft, planetary gearset and a collosal cogwheel.

Name: Create: Vintage Improvements
Description: Vintage Improvements is Create addon which adds new Kinetics Machines, metal rods, wires & springs to compat with Ad Astra & Create Crafts & Addtitions.

Name: Create: Interactive
Description: Interact with your Create contraptions in ways never before possible! All contraptions behave just like Minecraft blocks, so build, break, stack, and cause controlled chaos to your heart's content! You can now use contraptions on contraptions on contraptions on contraptions... and derail trains!

Name: Create Crafts & Additions
Description: Adds Electric devices and FE generation, to Create

Name: Create Stuff & Additions
Description: Adds useful tools with unique abilities to Create

Name: Create Misc & Things
Description: Adds some utility, building, and fun small things that don't fit in a theme

Name: Create: Dreams And Desires
Description: Create: Dreams & Desires is an addon for the Create mod that add random QoL, items, & blocks features that relates to old Create & New Create versions!

Name: Create: Sandpaper Overhaul
Description: Gives new uses to sandpaper, adds new types of sandpaper and introduces polishing wheel.

Name: Create: The Factory Must Grow
Description: A Dieselpunk-like addon for create.

Name: Create: Copycats+
Description: A vast selection of copycats for all your building needs. Forge and Fabric support included.

Name: Create: Crushing Quartz
Description: This small addon for Create allows you to crush quartz into experience. The recipe themselves were taken from Create Stuff & Additions.

Name: Create: Numismatics
Description: Numismatics is a brand-new currency mod that boasts easy-to-use systems for simple shops as well as leaving room for your wildest redstone-capitalism dreams.

Name: Create: Crystal Clear
Description: Adds glass casings to create, along with adding a few other glass related things in the near future.

Name: Create Deco
Description: A decoration expansion to Create

Name: Create Goggles
Description: Adds goggle helmets to Create

Name: Create: Alloyed
Description: Adds 2 new alloys to create

Name: Create: Alloyed Guns
Description:
DISCONTINUED, use Create Guns
Adds multiple guns into the style and feel of the create mod while also incorporating Create: Alloyed. "[...] most of this mod is mrcrayfish's work, it is essentially a reskin with more mechanics."

Name: Create Guns
Description: Create Guns changes the models and textures of the MrCrayfish's Gun Mod items to match closer with the Create mod. This mod supersedes Create: Alloyed Guns.

Name: Create Chunkloading
Description: Implements a chunkloader block that will keep chunks loaded around a moving Create contraption

Name: Create Gears
Description:
DISCONTINUED
Adds Shaftless cogwheels, a simple gearshift and fully encased chain drives to Create

Name: Create Gear addon
Description: Adds gears with textures colors from vanilla wood. It also override the recipe of the cogs in create to use only spruce wood and not all woods.

Name: Create Guardian Beam Defense
Description: Create Guardian Beam Defense is a mini mod / addon for Create that adds in stationary laser defense units themed around Guardians and Ocean Monuments that are capable of automatically locking on to specified mobs and damaging them over time in frequent bursts.

Name: Dave's Building Extended
Description: A building mod adding several blocks for Factories and trains Trains, as well as several ambience related system.

Name: More Mounted Storages
Description: Allows for a greater variety of the modded storages to be used as a part of Create moving contraptions

Name: Create: Mounted Storages
Description: A fork of More Mounted Storages.

Name: Create Live 3 Addon
Description: Used in the Create Live 3 Modpack

Name: Create Factory
Description: Adds a lot of new foods to Create

Name: Create Automated
Description:
DISCONTINUED
Allows automating items previously not automatable and adds ways of automating some of the ones that already are

Name: CreateFoodAdditions
Description: Adds a bunch of food to Create

Name: Create: Supercharged
Description:
DISCONTINUED
Adds a wide range of content mainly revolving around Superheated Mixers. Has since moved CurseForge pages to Create Chromatic Return [Below]

Name: Create Addon
Description: Adds tools and armor to Create

Name: Create: Armor and Weapons Addon
Description: Adds Weapons and Armor to Create

Name: Boat Contraption
Description:
DISCONTINUED, use /create passenger instead
Allows you to make boat contraptions with the Create mod... in a weird way

Name: Create: Steam 'n Rails
Description: Adds new train tracks made out of different wood types, monorail tracks (a remodel of train tracks), a special conductor mob, new semaphores, trains coupling and decoupling.

Name: Big Sip
Description: Adds a variety of new drinks and a new multiblock fluid storage, the maturing barrel, to make them.

Name: Liquid Burner
Description: Allows Blaze Burners to heat with liquids, with datapack support for mod compatibility.

Name: Potato Canon Plus
Description: Makes more food compatible with the Potato Canon.

Name: Discover Addon
Description: New materials, processing lines, and worldgen based on using liquid acid to dissolve/etch.

Name: Create: Broken Bad
Description: Adds a variety of items and substances related to production of certain chemicals.

Name: Create Mechanical Extruder
Description: Adds the Mechanical Extruder, able to generate any block or item from adjacent blocks/fluids.

Name: Create Ore Excavation
Description: Adds infinite ores and specialized drill to harvest them.

Name: Industrialized Create
Description: Adds additional paper, leather, diamond (similar to IC2), netherstar and dragonbreath production and compressed cobblestone blocks and more.

Name: Create: Condensed Milk
Description: Adds Condensed Lava, which reacts with Water/Lava to make renewable Cobbled Deepslate/Netherrack

Name: Expanding Technologies
Description: Adds railroad crossing lights

Name: Create more potatoes
Description: Adds more potato related blocks

Name: Create: Estrogen
Description: Create Addon Based around expressing yourself, fluid handling and expanding your factory. This mods add a lot of new Items, Blocks, Mechanics and more! The main feature of this mod is a pill that adds the ability to "dash", similar to the skill in another game, Celeste.

Name: Create: Villagerology
Description: Adds villagers and blocks features which you can trade and allow to make creative motor, creative tank, creative blaze cake etc. in survival

Name: Create: Sweets And Treats
Description: Sweets and Treats is a Create Mod addon That Adds new Foods such as: Chocolate Cookies, Brownies, Rock Candies, And Gunpowder Cakes To name a Few!

Name: Create: Garnished
Description: This mod adds multiple food items, mainly nuts!

Name: Create: Framed
Description: A Create mod addon that adds more Framed Glass variants.

Name: Create Irradiated
Description: Adds Uranium Chunks, Thorium Chunks and Plutonium Chunks, their respective ores, rubber, hazmat suit, some new tools and accessories and Radiation effect.

Name: Create Decoration Casing
Description: adds lots of block variants for Minecraft and create mod casings to make buildings and decorations

Name: Create: Power Loader
Description: Adds chunk loaders that require rotation powers, have configurable range and can optionally work on contraptions.

Name: Create: Connected
Description: Quality-of-life blocks and features that stay close to base Create.

Name: Create: Crushable deepslate
Description: This mod gives an ability to make an ore farm usuing deepslate(now awailable only on 1.18.2)

Name: Craftable Create Casings
Description: Adds a recipe for each create casing so you don't have to place it down every time.

Name: Protection Pixel
Description: Protection Pixel provides players with steampunk style armor, enriching their adventure journey. Each part of the armor has different functions and attributes to help players adapt to the rich environment in Minecraft and fight in the way they excel and enjoy. At the same time, players can use the massive industrial system of create to synthesize, process, and strengthen their armor.

Name: Create Picky Wheels
Description: Small changes to water wheels and windmills to make them a bit more realistic. For example, waterwheels will only work in River bioms and windmills need space for â€žair circulationâ€œ.

Name: Create: Experium ore
Description: Adds Experium, a Nether ore that, when crushed in crushing wheels, grants experience nuggets.

Name: Create: Blazing Hot
Description: Create: Blazing Hot adds Molten Metals, new alloy - Blaze Gold, Blaze Mixing, more metal food with unique effects, a new, faster way to generate Cobblestone, special arrows that deal extra damage in the Nether and Modern Lamps to light up your builds.

Name: Create: Cobblestone toDeepslate Compacting
Description: An extra recipe that lets you compact cobblestone to deep slate.

Name: Create: Colored Casings
Description: Adds extra casings

Name: Create Confectionery
Description: Adds several food items to Create

Name: Create Cafe
Description: Adds Drinks like Boba Milk Tea and Coffee (Not yet) that use the Create mod machines to make
